00092             function                process_sprintf( $Str , $Changed )
00093             {
00094                   try
00095                   {
00096                         $Limitations = array( 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00097                         for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'sprintf' , $Limitations ) ; )
00098                         {
00099                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00100                               
00101                               $Format = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'format' , '%s' );
00102                               $Value = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , '' );
00103                               
00104                               $Str = str_replace( "{sprintf:$Params}" , sprintf( $Format , $Value ) , $Str );
00105                               $Changed = true;
00106                         }
00107                         
00108                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00109                   }
00110                   catch( Exception $e )
00111                   {
00112                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00113                   }
00114             }
00115             
00142             function                process_encoding( $Str , $Changed )
00143             {
00144                   try
00145                   {
00146                         for( ; ( $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'encoding' ) ) !== false ; )
00147                         {
00148                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
00149                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'encoding.tpl' );
00150                               
00151                               $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , 'encoding' );
00152                               $Selected = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'selected' , 'utf-8' );
00153                               
00154                               $Template = str_replace( '{name}' , $Name , $Template );
00155                               $Template = str_replace( '{selected'.$Selected.'}' , 'selected' , $Template );
00156                               
00157                               $Str = str_replace( "{encoding:$Params}" , $Template , $Str );
00158                               
00159                               $Changed = true;
00160                         }
00161                         
00162                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00163                   }
00164                   catch( Exception $e )
00165                   {
00166                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00167                   }
00168             }
00169             
00196             function                process_nbsp( $Str , $Changed )
00197             {
00198                   try
00199                   {
00200                         for( ; ( $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'nbsp' ) ) !== false ; )
00201                         {
00202                               $Str = str_replace( "{nbsp:$Params}" , str_replace( ' ' , '&nbsp;' , $Params ) , $Str );
00203                               
00204                               $Changed = true;
00205                         }
00206                         
00207                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00208                   }
00209                   catch( Exception $e )
00210                   {
00211                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00212                   }
00213             }

00241             function                process_strlen( $Str , $Changed )
00242             {
00243                   try
00244                   {
00245                         $Limitations = array( 'str' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00246                         for( ; ( $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'strlen' , $Limitations ) ) !== false ; )
00247                         {
00248                               $Str = str_replace( "{strlen:$Params}" , strlen( $Params ) - 4 , $Str );
00249                               
00250                               $Changed = true;
00251                         }
00252                         
00253                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00254                   }
00255                   catch( Exception $e )
00256                   {
00257                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00258                   }
00259             }
00260             
00291             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00292             {
00293                   try
00294                   {
00295                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_sprintf( $Str , $Changed );
00296                         
00297                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_encoding( $Str , $Changed );
00298                         
00299                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_nbsp( $Str , $Changed );
00300                         
00301                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_strlen( $Str , $Changed );
00302                         
00303                         return( $Str );
00304                   }
00305                   catch( Exception $e )
00306                   {
00307                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00308                   }
